scripts.di:clean: tsx -e "import {ConfigManager} from './tools/config-manager.js'; ConfigManager.cleanOldConfigs(0); console.log('üóëÔ∏è Cleaned all DI configs');"
scripts.di:list: tsx -e "import * as fs from 'fs'; import * as path from 'path'; const dir='node_modules/.tdi2/configs'; if(fs.existsSync(dir)) { const configs = fs.readdirSync(dir); console.log('üìã Available configs:', configs); } else { console.log('No configs found'); }"
scripts.di:info: tsx -e "console.log('üîç DI Debug Info at: http://localhost:5173/_di_debug'); console.log('üìã Config List at: http://localhost:5173/_di_configs');"
